name: NoteSkin Selector
description:
A Remastered of NoteSkin Selector!

One of my old shitty mod, created in 2022. This mod heavily improves and enhances everything from the old mod. Making it selecting skins more easier and better.

It's basically, a more improved version of the current built-in noteskin system in the engine, because that one sucks ass ngl.

Version: 2.1.0
